markdown:
What is **Academic Rules & Regulations**?
-----------------------------------------

Rules and regulations contain arrangements or norms that regulate student behavior while studying at Universiti Teknologi Malaysia, This Academic regulation applies to the Universiti Teknologi Malaysia Full-Time Bachelor’s Degree Programme, Full-time Diploma Programme, International Joint Programme, Part-time Degree Programme, and Part-time Diploma Programme. Implementation of this Academic Regulations covers only the regular semesters unless otherwise stated.
